hero.headline: Build Modern Web Experiences
hero.subcopy: Create stunning, high-performance websites with our powerful platform. From landing pages to complex applications, we've got you covered.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized for speed with sub-second load times and instant page transitions.

features.title: Fully Responsive
features.description: Pixel-perfect on every device, from mobile phones to large desktop displays.

features.title: Accessible
features.description: Built with WCAG AA standards ensuring your content is available to everyone.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Automatic metadata generation and structured data for better search rankings.

features.title: Dark Mode
features.description: Beautiful dark theme with system preference detection and manual toggle.

features.title: Built-in Analytics
features.description: Track user engagement with privacy-first analytics integration.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: This platform transformed how we build landing pages. The speed and ease of use are unmatched. We launched our campaign in half the expected time.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The dark mode implementation is flawless, and the performance scores are consistently in the 90s. Highly recommended for any serious developer.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Finally, a platform that understands both design and development needs. The component system makes maintaining brand consistency effortless.

pricing.name: Starter
pricing.description: Perfect for personal projects and small websites

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: Best for growing businesses and startups

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: For large teams with specific requirements

faq.question: How do I get started with the platform?
faq.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply create an account, choose a template that fits your needs, and start customizing. Our drag-and-drop interface makes it simple to build your site in minutes.

faq.question: Can I use my own custom domain?
faq.answer: Yes! On Pro and Enterprise plans, you can connect your own custom domain. We also provide free SSL certificates for all custom domains to ensure your site is secure.

faq.question: Is my data secure on your platform?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR and SOC 2 standards. Your data is stored in secure, redundant data centers.

faq.question: Can I export my site code?
faq.answer: Yes, all plans include the ability to export your site as clean, optimized HTML/CSS/JavaScript code. This gives you full ownership and flexibility to host anywhere.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer community support for all users, priority email support for Pro users, and dedicated account managers for Enterprise customers with 24/7 phone support available.

faq.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days of your paid subscription, we'll provide a full refund, no questions asked.

newsletter.headline: Stay in the Loop
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates, tips, and exclusive content delivered straight to your inbox.
